entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers at times heavy beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 early this evening then light near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
